title: Add FO-01 KV seed entries
description:
Add KV store entries for FO-01 to src/db/seed.ts

Required entries:
- versions.fo-01._info.default - Version description
- versions.fo-01._model_name.default - Model (google/gemini-2.5-flash or openai/gpt-4o-mini)
- versions.fo-01._temperature.default - Temperature 0.9 (like AP-01)
- versions.fo-01.system.default - Full system prompt with AP-01 quality guidelines
- versions.fo-01.prompt.default - User prompt template with Liquid variables (name, intention)

System prompt must include:
- Structure rules (first-person, present tense, declarative)
- Sentence opener distribution (35-40% I am, etc.)
- Length guidelines (5-9 words target)
- Tone guidelines
- Power verbs list
- Avoid list
- JSON array output format

Run npm run db:seed after adding entries.
acceptance_criteria: Seed entries added, db:seed runs without error
